text: A former employee is suing Martina McBride, her husband John McBride and their recording company Blackbird Studios for $1 million. The plaintiff, Richard Hanson, claims the defendants... ...... read full story
title: Martina McBride and Her Husband Face $1 Million Lawsuit Over Retaliation Claims
